about_the_game:
Illusion Within, whose core mechanics involve the protagonist creating gaps in space and time and replenishing the world's energy, leading him to other worlds in Scandinavia. Trying to create rifts in worlds time after time, the protagonist will get closer and closer to death, but despite the consequences, will have to make a difficult choice.

.

A dizzying detective horror game set in the mystical worlds of Scandinavia.
Playing as Gabriel, you find yourself in a confusing situation trying to get your wife and son Jeremy back. To accomplish this, you must unravel the secrets of Ragnarok and confront the jotun giants and their minions..

HISTORY.
Make your way through the torment awaiting in the worlds, passing all of Loki's tests and killing all of the giants, time after time making your way through the gaps despite the dire consequences.



Embark on a journey through stunning Scandinavian landscapes where hallucinations blur the line between reality and nightmare. Armed with detective skills and a powerful arsenal, you'll battle grotesque monsters and discover the truth behind your wife's murder and the search for your son.

GAMEPLAY.
Use the gun given by your wife and your detective skills to survive encounters with giants.



Decide who to trust.
But beware, not everything is as it seems. Loki, the god of deception, lurks in the shadows, offering cryptic clues. Trusting him can lead you astray, and the mysterious voice in your head holds his secrets. The choices you make will determine the outcome of the entire story.

DETECTIVE.
Use your investigative skills and intuition to solve a mysterious murder mystery



ATMOSPHERE.
Immerse yourself in the atmospheric world of Gabriel, where tense first-person shootouts combine with mind-bending psychedelic horror and thrilling adventure. Discover the truth, battle your demons and recover your lost memory in this unique and addictive gameplay experience.
Beautiful graphics and high quality 3D sound will help you fully experience the magical atmosphere of the game.



Experience for yourself all the psychedelic horror of the main character's memories

content_descriptors.notes: There are scenes of murder and suicide, and there is profanity dialogue.

Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10, 11
  • Processor: Amd Ryzen 5 1600 / Core i3 10100
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1080 / RX 5700XT (FHD)
  • Storage: 25 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10, 11
  • Processor: Amd Ryzen 5 3600 / core i5 10100
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 2070 / RX 6600XT (FHD)
  • Storage: 25 GB available space

short_description: Survival Horror - An Action game in a detective setting in which you must bring about Ragnarok. Set up rifts in the worlds of Scandinavia by destroying the Jotun giants to fulfill your part of the bargain promised by Loki. You will have to make hard choices and decide Gabriel's fate.
supported_languages:
English*, Russian*, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Turkish, Japanese
*languages with full audio support
